pr_title: GEODE-7957: query results toData will write to correct output stream

timeline.message:
GEODE-7957: toData will write to the correct output stream to preserve ordering

  * Previously, when a query is executed in a function, the toData on specific results
    set types would write directly to the wrong output stream, causing deserialization issues

timeline.bodyText: You might want to remove this one :-)
timeline.author: jujoramos

timeline.bodyText: This one can be declared as static final REGION_NAME as it's a constant.
timeline.author: jujoramos

timeline.bodyText: Can be replaced with int port = server1.invoke(this::createServerAndRegion);.
timeline.author: jujoramos

timeline.bodyText: Can be replaced with server2.invoke((SerializableRunnableIF) this::createServerAndRegion);.
timeline.author: jujoramos

timeline.bodyText: We are replacing usages of JUnit asserts for assert4j, we can change this before merging the pull request to make sure we don't need to revisit this test in the future.
timeline.author: jujoramos
